Word Dynamo - Flashcards & Word Games by Dictionary.com

By Dictionary.com, LLC

View More by This Developer

Open iTunes to buy and download apps.

Description

Top-rated word game app by Dictionary.com. Cited by CBS: “Word Dynamo can be used and enjoyed by everyone from elementary school students to college graduates.” Named Appolicious top iOS app. Rated 9.1 Learning Score by Learning Works for Kids.

Word Dynamo combines addicting games with Dictionary.com’s entire word library empowering students to master their vocabulary. With different game types including audio, flashcards, and definition matching, Word Dynamo creates a personalized learning experience suitable for students of all grade levels.
Millions of students in elementary school, middle school, high school and college use Word Dynamo every day!

Play & learn with Dictionary.com’s trusted content, or create your own games with your own word lists for any subject.

Tip: This game is the best way to have fun while you plow through your tough homework – an essential for any student.
-Improve your vocabulary, language skills, and writing ability with exciting word games
-Get your word score & then play word games to earn more points
-Choose between game types: match, flashcards or listen
-Play over 50 addicting Word Challenges
-Create your own games, word lists & flashcards
-Browse the extensive Dictionary.com library or word lists – over 100k!
-Select any subject or topic to play/learn, including test prep: PSAT, SAT, GRE, ACT, TOEFL and AP
-Track your progress and games on your personalized dashboard
-Sync your progress automatically while you play on your iPad, iPhone and laptop
-Access your content offline - without an internet connection
Word Dynamo is applicable for all ages, whether you are simply trying to improve your vocabulary with fun word games or use flashcard mode for help with school.

NOTE: This app is compatible with all iPads and iPhone models (4 and newer).

Highlighted iTunes reviews from our happy users

“Love this App. Innovative design, loads of fun, challenging and educational all rolled into one game app and for all ages! What’s not to love?”

“This is an awesome app for playing fun vocab games. Game features are perfect – engaging without being overly distracting, so it keeps you focused on actually learning words. Great coverage of word lists to choose from, from academic (test prep, school subjects) to fun (check out the stuff in the English section).”

“App gets you hooked on games, flashcards and building your vocabulary. Use this app and select the GRE word set to challenge yourself, even if you are not preparing for grad school.”

“Easy to use. A ton of awesome word lists. Plus the ability to make my own. Syncs with the online version.”

“I am a Spanish speaker and I found this product excellent for improving my English.”

“This app is amazing. I’ve already started making use of it to study my SAT words!”

We're always looking to improve our apps. Please send your feedback and suggestions to: feedback@dictionary.com

Your privacy is very important to Dictionary.com. This app does not include any third-party advertising or in-app purchases. For more details, please see our Privacy Policy: http://dictionary.reference.com/help/privacy.html.

Educators: this app is eligible for a 50 percent discount through Apple’s Volume Licensing Program, an affordable and convenient way to distribute Word Dynamo to students, teachers, and administrators at your school or educational institution.

What's New in Version 2.0

• Now available universally on both iPhone and iPad
• Added 50 more Word Challenges by popular demand
• Fixed bugs and improved the following features: creating word lists, logging in, browsing lists

NOTE: This app is compatible with all iPads and iPhone models (4 and newer).

Customer Reviews

Absolutely love
     
by Tommy Becks

This app is absolutely amazing. It is the best when it comes to studying and learning. There's nothing better than expanding your knowledge by using this app. It has been the reason why I've been getting fantastic grades during my college semesters.

The only flaw is that, and there aren't many at all, is that when you do the multiple-choice questions, it cuts off the definitions in the multiple-choice. It does not give you an option to expand your choices and to further read them. It cuts them short. Being able to see the full definitions during multiple choice selection in the study prep would be extremely helpful.

Warning, You Will Enlightened and Amused
     
by MickySue555

Call me a GEEK, I will proudly accept this as a compliment, who loves
learning - especially about words and their origins!! This app is brilliant and offers a wide variety of subjects to choose from. For life long learners, this
App will enhance and expand your knowledge. Well worth the money!!

Fun and challenging
     
by Defender90CA

I try and encourage my students to expand their vocabularies and THIS app keeps me thinking about new words I can share with them. I love that the update includes challenges aimed specifically at me based on my word scores, too. Great job!
